means: 班加西（利比亚东北的一个城市，位于锡德拉海湾。自从古希腊、罗马时代即有居民，是主要港口， 1951年至1972年是利比亚首都。人口367， 600）

sentence.Network_en: If the enemy broke through to Agedabia, Benghazi and everything west of Tobruk were imperilled.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果敌人突破阿杰达比亚, 那么班加西以及托卜鲁克以西的一切据点便都岌岌可危了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: so my friend xavier , a reporter for barcelona' s la vanguardia , and I hop in a taxi in benghazi and head south to ajdabiya .于是，我的朋友、巴塞罗那《先锋报（lavanguardia）》记者泽维尔（xavier）和我一起，两人跳上一部出租车从班加西南下艾季达比耶。
benger 本格尔, benghazi 班加西, bengert 本格特

means.word_mean: 1. port in northern Libya on the Gulf of Sidra; formerly a joint capital of Libya with Tripoli

auth_sentence.content: Protests in Benghazi first broke out in mid-February.
auth_sentence.res_content: Protests in Benghazi first broke out in mid-February.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Protests in Benghazi first broke out in mid-February.

auth_sentence.res_content: He also said that another diplomatic mission would be sent to Benghazi shortly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also said that another diplomatic mission would be sent to Benghazi shortly.

auth_sentence.content: But CNN journalists in Benghazi saw no indications of counter-revolutionary uprisings or protests there.
auth_sentence.res_content: But CNN journalists in Benghazi saw no indications of counter-revolutionary uprisings or protests there.
